posts.post_content:
Hi all - I am looking to complete my collection of Brooklyn T206. I have an assortment of other T206 cards (both raw and PSA) that I'd like to trade. Please see below a list of cards available for trade and what is remaining on my checklist. I can provide pictures on request.

Available for Trade
  * Arndt, Providence - Piedmont (PSA 2)
  * Spade, Cincinnati - Piedmont (Raw)
  * Herzog, NY - Piedmont (Raw)
  * Mitchell, Toronto - Piedmont (Raw)
  * Thomas, Phila - Piedmont (Raw)
  * Delehanty, Lou - Piedmont (Raw)
  * Congalton, Col. - Sovereign (Raw)
  * Spencer, Bos - Piedmont (Raw, poor condition)
  * Hoffman, StL - Piedmont (Raw)
  * Payne, CHI - Piedmont (Raw)
  * Paskert, Cin - Sweet Piedmont (Raw)
  * Oakes, Cin - Sweet Caporal (Raw)
  * Schram, Buffalo - Piedmont (Raw)


Brooklyn Cards Wanted
  * Bell, hands over head
  * Bell, follow through 
  * Burch, batting
  * Burch, fielding
  * Dahlen
  * Hummel
  * Hunter
  * Marshall
  * Smith
  * Wilhelm, batting
